dcterms:description: A subset of the Internet Argument Corpus that consists of discussion forum data, containing sarcastic responses and their context. The annotation of sarcastic vs. non-sarcastic replies was done using crowdsourcing.
dcterms:title: Sarcasm Corpus V2

dcterms:description: A dataset of sarcastic and non-sarcastic tweets collected using specific hashtags. The dataset includes tweets that are replies to previous tweets, providing conversation context.
dcterms:title: Twitter dataset (sarcastic and non-sarcastic tweets)
